entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
